name: Battle royale simulator
description: Battle royale simulator lets you simulate and control a battle royale game. You can choose the amount of player (like 600 at max), game speed, air drops, where the storm will close and just some really cool...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 32-bit Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 32-bit Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher. DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 4 GB available space
